description: A classic combination of goats cheese and beetroot paired with filling quinoa and crunchy hazelnuts.
name: Quinoa, Goats Cheese & Beetroot Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble the goats cheese in, add the chopped hazelnuts and cracked black pepper, toss and serve.
